title: Urban Salad
typeOfFood: Raw, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Salad bar place where you could create-your-own from a variety of veggies and toppings (like lentils, chickpeas, pine nuts) and vegan suitable dressing like raspberry or lime vinaigrette, soy sesame dressing. Salad could be packed in a whole wheat wrap. Limited seating.
